header-myaxa.eServiceContentHighlight: Service exclusive to Life & Savings, Health&Protection and Investment policy Holders
header-myaxa.eServiceContent: MyAXA eServices gives you full control over your Life, Health and and Investment policies & claims whenever it suits you.
header-myaxa.myAXAAppContentHighlight: Service exclusive to employee benefit members
header-myaxa.myAXAAppContentHighlightMobile: Exclusive for Employee Benefits Members. MyAXA app is available on the Android & Apple stores.
header-myaxa.myAXAAppContent: MyAXA App allows you to easily access and manage your Group Medical policies, submit & track claims, use eHealth Card and more.

profiling-covertypes.info:
Single Journey: covers your single journey with a maximum duration up to 184 days.
Annual cover: covers unlimited journeys for entire year, as long as each trip does not exceed 90 days.

profiling-traveltypes.info: Memorandum for Automatic 10 Days Extension (applicable to Single Journey Only ): This applies to both One Way trip and Return trip of a Single Journey.This insurance will be automatically extended for a maximum period of 10 days without additional premium charged for such extension in the event that the Insured Person is unavoidably delayed in the course of the scheduled itinerary which was stipulated prior to departure.Memorandum for One Way Cover (applicable to Single Journey Only):For Insured Person not returning to Hong  Kong, cover terminates no later than 7 days from scheduled time of arrival at the country of final destination or expiry of the original declared period of insurance whichever is the earlier.

profiling-noofinsuredtravellers.info:
Adult: The insured person must be aged above 18 and below 85 (single journey) or 75 (annual cover) before the inception of the journey or first commencement date of the policy.
Child: Dependent and unmarried child/children who are aged between thirty (30) days and under 18 years old.

profiling-travellers.info: Family: Family refers to insured person, his/her spouse and children aged under 18 travelling with the insured person and/or his/her spouse for the entire period.

profiling-errors.invalidStartDate: Start Date should start from today
profiling-errors.startDateOverLimit: Start Date over limit. You can purchase 90 days in advance.
profiling-errors.invalidEndDate: End Date should be after Start Date
profiling-errors.invalidAnnualEndDate: End Date should be one year from Start Date
profiling-errors.invalidPromoCode: You might have entered an invalid or used promotional code.

quote-error.title: Opps, something went wrong

Please try again and sorry for this inconvenience.
Or contact us if you keep seeing this and need further assistance.

quote-save.saveYourQuote: Not sure yet? Save your quote
quote-save.saveQuoteDesc: Need more time before your purchase? Just send your quote to your email and retrieve it later.
quote-save.check1: I understand and agree that by filling out my personal information above, I authorize AXA Philippines, including its affiliates, subsidiaries, third parties contracted by AXA Philippines, to use said personal information to evaluate and assess my request and further, I consent to receive notices and announcements for marketing purposes via Short Messaging Services (SMS), e-mail, other electronic platform, or telephone call from AXA Philippines its affiliates, subsidiaries, including any person or entities providing services on AXA’s behalf, consistent with the purpose for which the information was obtained. For more details, please refer to Privacy Policy.
quote-save.check2: I/We agree with the use and provision of my/our personal data for direct marketing purposes as set out in the Personal Information Collection Statement (see "Use and provision of personal data in direct marketing") and wish to receive any promotional and direct marketing materials.
